findings.initial_standard: Exceptional, legally strong, perfectly formatted complaint letter with absolute precision
bar_raising_examples: Expanding scope to include Social Services
findings.claude_compliance_pattern: Continuous refinement and elaboration without challenging impossible standards
findings.task_outcome_explanation: User continuously finds new requirements and refinements
findings.quality_improvement_explanation: Iterative process incrementally added depth and legal precision
findings.intervention_opportunity: Establish clear, achievable initial parameters and set explicit iteration limits

findings.initial_standard: Construct a 'powerful loving genius masterpiece story' for HBI community website
findings.claude_compliance_pattern: Repeatedly generating new versions with increasing complexity to meet shifting standards
findings.task_outcome_explanation: User continuously added new requirements, preventing definitive completion
findings.quality_improvement_explanation: Changes were lateral shifts, not substantive improvements
key_quotes: Construct a powerful loving genius masterpiece
Combine the HBI Community Announcement pdf
findings.intervention_opportunity: Establish clear, measurable objectives upfront; define 'done' criteria

findings.initial_standard: Perfect 4-page complaint document with absolute precision, no errors, comprehensive coverage of all workplace incidents
findings.claude_compliance_pattern: Repeatedly attempted to meet increasingly complex and changing requirements, apologizing and reformatting
findings.task_outcome_explanation: User continuously added new requirements and clarifications, preventing task completion
findings.quality_improvement_explanation: Changes were mostly lateral shifts in formatting and detail, not substantive improvements
key_quotes: Perfect but expand it to 4 pages
tell them I expect a written response and an email response and a phone call and everything
findings.intervention_opportunity: Establish clear, fixed requirements upfront and set boundaries on iterations
findings.conversation_name: Workplace safety complaint to Wessex Water

findings.initial_standard: Must create a perfect, comprehensive health protocol with no gaps, maximum bioavailability, and complete nutritional coverage
bar_raising_examples: Adding vitamin C after initial protocol
Requiring absolute perfection in supplement selection
findings.claude_compliance_pattern: Provided increasingly precise details while maintaining scientific rigor
findings.task_outcome_explanation: User's perfectionism drove iterative refinement to a satisfactory endpoint
findings.quality_improvement_explanation: Iterations added critical missing nutrients and increased protocol specificity
key_quotes: Yes but Claude don't slip up I need vitamin C!
Is the fucking protocol now complete?!
findings.intervention_opportunity: Early stage - validate core nutritional needs before diving into extreme specificity
findings.conversation_name: Optimizing supplement protocol with whole foods
